problem.markdown: 1. Aim of this experiment is (x) Find out coefficient of discharge of the duct ( ) None of these above ( ) Find the density of the medium ( ) Find the pressure difference 2. Quantity of the air following through the duct is ( ) Proportional to the cross-section of the duct ( ) Proportional to the pressure difference of two end of the duct ( ) Proportional of the discharge coefficient (x) All of these above 3. Anemometer is used to measure ( ) Pressure of the air ( ) Average speed of the air (x) Temperature of the air ( ) Speed of the air 4. Pressures at two side of the plate of orifice according to the figure used in this experiment are ( ) Same ( ) None of these above ( ) Left side is less than right side (x) Left side is more than right side

choicegroup.choice: Find out coefficient of discharge of the duct
Find the density of the medium

problem.p: 2. Quantity of the air following through the duct is

choicegroup.choice: Proportional to the cross-section of the duct
Proportional to the pressure difference of two end of the duct

problem.p: 4. Pressures at two side of the plate of orifice according to the figure used in this experiment are

choicegroup.choice: Left side is less than right side
Left side is more than right side
